title: Ticket #4057: Remove PrivSep from the HTCondor code base
description:
Sadly, the amount of effort that goes into maintaining PrivSep does not seem to be worth it. No one outside of the UW appears to use it. It has many separate code paths which lead to inconsistent behavior when using vs not using PrivSep. It is incompatible with other desirable features such as cgroups. It requires HTCondor to be installed differently and started differently via init scripts.

As such, we are removing it from the code base to simplify things.
